title: Add comprehensive tests for epic-centric infrastructure
description: Create comprehensive test coverage for all epic-centric infrastructure components: IsEpicComplete, GetMissionForTask, mission context in ready work, and executor epic completion flow.
design:
Test categories:
1. Unit tests for IsEpicComplete():
   - Epic with all children closed → complete
   - Epic with open child → incomplete
   - Epic with blocked child → incomplete
   - Epic with no children → complete
   - Epic with open blocking dep → incomplete

2. Unit tests for GetMissionForTask():
   - Task → phase → mission (3 levels)
   - Task → mission (2 levels)
   - Task with no parent → error
   - Task with non-mission parent → error

3. Unit tests for mission context in ready work:
   - Ready tasks include mission IDs
   - Filtering by active missions
   - Exclude tasks from missions with needs-quality-gates

4. Integration tests for executor flow:
   - Complete all tasks in epic → epic marked complete
   - Nested epics: phase complete → mission not complete
   - Multiple epics: complete one → others unaffected
acceptance_criteria:
- Unit tests for IsEpicComplete() (80%+ coverage)
- Unit tests for GetMissionForTask() (80%+ coverage)
- Unit tests for mission context queries (80%+ coverage)
- Integration tests for executor epic completion
- All tests pass in CI
- Tests cover edge cases (no parents, nested epics, etc.)
- Test fixtures use realistic mission hierarchies
